name: hive
content:
hive noun
(BEES)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a structure where bees live, either built by people or made by the bees themselves : Bees naturally attack anything entering their hives.
Alina555/E+/GettyImages
[ + sing/pl verb, C ] a group of bees living together in a hive: The varroa mite is a tiny insect that infects bees and eventually kills whole hives.
More examplesFewer examplesHoneybees typically build their hive in a dark, dry place, such as in a tree hollow. The beekeeper blows puffs of smoke into the hives to distract the bees when he is making an inspection. When a honeybee encounters a dead bee in the hive, it tosses it out of the colony. We encountered a large hive of ground bees along the way. They need to buy replacement bees when hives die off.He imitates the buzzing of a hive of bees.
